Text.Value: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Hunting... ingredients... noblestalk... with my love...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Why were you in the Underdark?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Synopsis: Baelen was out hunting Noblestalk when he was trapped in a field of explosive mushrooms. He's now dead - most likely because the player triggered those mushrooms to explode. He speaks in short, cryptic fragments from beyond the grave.
